name: 十九世紀歐洲繪畫專題研究
description: 使學生熟悉並能分析十九世紀歐繪畫的文化政治議題並能在閱讀中理解藝術作為文化精隨的核心
goals: 使學生熟悉並能分析十九世紀歐繪畫的文化政治議題並能在閱讀中理解藝術作為文化精隨的核心
syllabus:
**Neoclassicism**

Thomas Crow, "Patriotism and Virture: David to the Young Ingres." _Nineteenth_

       _Century Art: a critical history_. Ed., S. F. Eisenman. (London: Thamas &

       Hudson, 1994), pp.14-19. (The Cult of Civic Virtue; A call to order)

Thomas Crow, "Classicism in Crisis: Crod to Delacroix." _Nineteenth_

       _Century Art: a critical history_. Ed., S. F. Eisenman. pp. 67-77. (Punishements

       of the Damaned)

Brian Lukacher, "Visionary History Painting: Blake and his Contemporaries."

       _Nineteenth Century Art: a critical history_. Ed., S. F. Eisenman. pp. 98-103.

       (Blake's Revolution); (Body Politics and Religious Mysticism)

Brian Lukacher, Nature Historicized: Constable, Turner, and Romantic Landscape

       Painting. _Nineteenth Century Art: a critical history_. Ed., S. F. Eisenman. pp.

       115-128. (Turner's Meaningful Obscurity, PP.130-137.)

David Bindman, "White Skin, White Marble: sculpture and race in the Romantic

       period." lecture paper. 2017.

David Bindman, Was Uncle Tom an Uncle Tom? The Representation of American

       slaves. Lecture paper, 2017.

Frances K. Pohl, "Black and White in America." _Nineteenth Century Art: a critical_

       _history_. Ed., S. F. Eisenman. pp.163-168.; pp. 180-187.

S. F. Eisenman, "The Generation of 1830 and the Crisis in the Public Sphere."

       _Nineteenth Century Art: a critical history_. PP. 188-191; 202-205.

S. F. Eisenman, "The Rhetoric of Realism: Courbet and the Origins of the Avant-Garde.

       "_Nineteenth Century Art: a critical history_. PP. 206-224.

S. F. Eisenman, "The Decline of History Painting: Germany, Italy, and France."

        _Nineteenth Century Art: a critical history_. PP.218-237.

S. F. Eisenman, "Manet and the Impressionists." _Nineteenth Century Art: a critical_

        _history_. PP. 238-244. (Edouard Manet and Haussmannization); pp.244-254.

        (Impressionism and the Commodity)

Linda Nochlin, ""Issues of Gender in Cassatt and Eakins." _Nineteenth Century Art: a_

        _critical history_. Ed., S. F. Eisenman. pp.255-273.
